message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the issue of DDoS attacks on web servers, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed mechanism involves monitoring network traffic and statistical analysis, which suggests the paper may also fall under the categories of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the importance of monitoring web-based applications, which suggests it may fall under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper proposes a new defense mechanism, which suggests it may also fall under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
